definition: old variant of 臘|腊[la4]/12th lunar month

sentences.english: The second chapter questioned the ancient Greek's thoughts about heroes and women.
sentences.chinese: 第二章侧重于对古希腊人英雄观与女性观的质疑。

sentences.english: Then , there were banks in ancient Greece and Rome, too?
sentences.chinese: 那时，古希腊和罗马也有银行吗？

sentences.english: So there was a huge variety of philosophy in ancient Greece.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊存在着大量的哲学流派。

sentences.english: The source of the word, Pygmalion is ancient Greece.
And could the "Greek serenity" of later Greek periods be only a red sunset?
sentences.chinese: 古希腊后期的“希腊的宁静”只能是一片落日的余晖？

sentences.english: The ancient Greek Parthenon is famed for its beautiful sculpture in bas-relief.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊的帕台农神殿因其美丽的浮雕雕塑而闻名。

sentences.english: The colonnaded temples of ancient Greece are famous.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊有柱廊的神殿十分著名。

sentences.english: Odyssey is an epic of ancient Greece.
sentences.chinese: 《奥德塞》是古希腊的一首史诗。

sentences.english: Mary does her hair after the ancient Greek fashion.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽仿照古希腊的式样做头发。

sentences.english: The architecture in ancient Greek is really the unique sculptures.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊的建筑的确是独一无二的雕塑品。

sentences.english: The practice of cupping has been mentioned in ancient Greek and Egyptian texts.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊和古埃及的文献中都提到过拔火罐。

sentences.english: Lyres were played by the ancient Greeks.
This is where the word roots emerged in ancient Greek.
sentences.chinese: 这个词根这样出现在古希腊语里。

sentences.english: As we all know, Plotinus is one of the eminent philosophers during the transitional period between the ancient Greece and the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 普罗提诺是古希腊与中世纪之交的一位重要思想家。

sentences.english: Fan Li and Aristotle are respectively politicians in ancient Chinaand Greece.
sentences.chinese: 范蠡和亚里士多德是古代中国和古希腊的两大政治家。

sentences.english: During the middle ages, Greek civilization declined and became effete.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪，古希腊文明开始衰落，一蹶不振。

definition: Euripides (c. 480-406 BC), Greek tragedian, author of Medea, Trojan Women etc

pinyin: Ya4 li4 shan1 da4 Da4 di4

definition: Aeschylus (c. 524 BC -c. 455 BC), Greek tragedian, author of The Persians, Seven against Thebes etc
Thucydides (c. 455 - c. 400 BC), Greek historian, author of the History of the Peloponnesian War
